channel.title: python on Andy's Garden
channel.description: Recent content in python on Andy's Garden

item.title: Python Packaging
item.description: I didn’t know what to use between poetry and hatch. I just followed the guide from the Packaging Guide. It ended with me having the following directory structure . ├── pyproject.toml ├── README.org ├── src │ └── andy_aoc_2023 │ ├── day1.py │ └── __init__.py └── tests Which isn’t too crazy I guess.
